article.title: Don't just do something; stand there

user.bio: I love design, inspiration and good ideas. I am working for the Telekom Products & Innovation - Product Design - team.

topquote.quote: That it might be possible to arrange one's life so as to be slightly less frantic has somehow become unimaginable. And yet there is a great deal to be gained from doing nothing. We need space to brood and ruminate and mull. We need to slow down to get where we're going.
